verses.verse: The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1066>Bochim.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I made you to go <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H935>brought<s%> you to the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> 'I will never <S%H6565>break<s%> my covenant with <S%H1285>you:<s%>

and you shall <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land;<s%> you shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars.<s%>' But you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> why have you done <S%H6213>this?<s%>

Therefore I also <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6654>you;<s%> but they shall be in your sides, and their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall be a snare to <S%H4170>you.<s%>"

It <S%H4397>happened,<s%> when the angel of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>
They <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1066>Bochim:<s%> and they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> there to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Now when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had sent the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> who <S%H3117>outlived<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> who had <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that he had <S%H6213>worked<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old.<s%>

They <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in Timnath <S%H669>Heres,<s%> in the hill country of Ephraim, on the north of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

Also all that <S%H1755>generation<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and there <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3045>them,<s%> who didn't know <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> nor yet the <S%H4639>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>worked<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals;<s%>

and they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> who brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who were <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7812>them,<s%> and bowed themselves down to <S%H3068>them:<s%> and they provoked Yahweh to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>
They <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth.<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H8154>spoilers<s%> who <S%H8155>despoiled<s%> <S%H4376>them;<s%> and he sold them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not any <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Wherever they went <S%H3318>out,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was against them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H3966>them:<s%> and they were very <S%H3334>distressed.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8199>judges,<s%> who <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who despoiled <S%H8154>them.<s%>

Yet they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to their <S%H8199>judges;<s%> for they played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves down to <S%H5493>them:<s%> they turned aside <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> in which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> <S%H8085>obeying<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> They <S%H6213>didn't<s%> do so.

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> them up <S%H8199>judges,<s%> then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> and <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judge:<s%> for it <S%H5162>grieved<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H5009>groaning<s%> by reason of those who <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> them and troubled <S%H1766>them.<s%>

But it <S%H8199>happened,<s%> when the judge was <S%H4194>dead,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7843>back,<s%> and dealt more corruptly than their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> in <S%H3212>following<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them,<s%> and to bow down to <S%H5307>them;<s%> they didn't cease from their <S%H4611>doings,<s%> nor from their <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because this <S%H1471>nation<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

I also will not <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> them of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> when he <S%H4191>died;<s%>

that by them I may <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether they will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H1>therein,<s%> as their fathers kept <S%H8104>it,<s%> or not."

So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3240>left<s%> those <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> driving them <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4118>hastily;<s%> neither <S%H5414>delivered<s%> he them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>
